ModMetaData.name: Hard Mode
ModMetaData.author: DrWhat
ModMetaData.description: v0.1 - "New Colony Optimism" has been replaced by adrenaline. It wears off faster. - You can cook on campfires, which have been moved to the Production tab. - It's very, very dark at night. You probably want to build that campfire first thing. - Mining is a technology. You can't mine until you've researched it.
